message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $100?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. Considering my budget, would you be open to selling the product for $105?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $115. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'll offer you the product for $112.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate the effort to find a middle ground. Considering my budget constraints, could you possibly sell the product for $107?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $115.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. Considering my financial constraints, could you possibly lower the price to $110?
I'm almost at my limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more small concession. I'll offer you the product for $112.50.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to help me within my budget. Considering my financial situation, could you possibly sell the product for $110?
